'Marjolein Beumer' (born October 27, 1966, Amstelveen, Noord-Holland,
Netherlands) is a Dutch actress. She is the sister of the actress Famke Janssen
([[GoldenEye]], [[X-Men (film)|X-Men]]) and the director Antoinette Beumer. She
is married to fellow performer Rik Launspach.
